Title: Increases the amount of the exemption permitted for capital improvements to residential buildings
Summary: Increases the amount of the exemption permitted for capital improvements to residential buildings from $80,000 to $200,000 where a local law or resolution is adopted on or after January 1, 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to increasing the amount of the exemption permitted for capital improvements to residential buildings
